comments.body:
Try adding:

```yaml
  entry_points:
    - addfips=addfips.__main__:main
```

here to fix the Windows failure.

PS: consider using grayskull to create the recipe, it will add that automatically for you.
Ahhhh, okay great. Thanks for that. I'll look into grayskull. It just sounds so scary. :skull:

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +13,17 @@  skip: True  # [not unix]
  number: 0
  script: "{{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv"
  entry_points:
    - addfips = addfips.__main__:main
